Instance.description: Situation for controlling the Mother Plant Battle

TunableTuple.name: attack_battle_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: State in which we are battling the plant with extra attack damage.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: base_battle_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: State in which we are battling the plant with no special buffs.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

Tunable.name: defeat_audio_sting
Tunable.description: The sound to play when the Sim loses the battle.

Tunable.name: fight_affordance
Tunable.description: The primary fight interaction that we will use to run the defeat mixer the player Sim.

Tunable.name: helper_1_job
Tunable.description: Job for one of the helper Sims for the fight.

Tunable.name: helper_2_job
Tunable.description: Job for one of the helper Sims for the fight.

Tunable.name: helper_3_job
Tunable.description: Job for one of the helper Sims for the fight.

Tunable.name: helper_lose_affordance
Tunable.description: The affordance that will be pushed on the helper Sims if they lose.

Tunable.name: helper_sim_prepare_role_state_1
Tunable.description: Role state for helper Sim 1 when preparing for battle.

Tunable.name: helper_sim_prepare_role_state_2
Tunable.description: Role state for helper Sim 2 when preparing for battle.

Tunable.name: helper_sim_prepare_role_state_3
Tunable.description: Role state for helper Sim 3 when preparing for battle.

Tunable.name: helper_victory_affordance
Tunable.description: The affordance that will be pushed on the helper Sims if they achieve victory.

TunableTuple.name: inspire_battle_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: State in which we are battling the plant while inspired.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: loss_interaction_mixer
Tunable.description: The affordance that will be pushed on the primary Sims if they lose.

Tunable.name: mother_plant_definition
Tunable.description: The actual mother plant itself.

Tunable.name: mother_plant_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed in the situation UI beside the mother plant health bar.

TunableTuple.name: mother_plant_meter_settings
TunableTuple.description: The meter used to track the health of the mother plant.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

TunableList.name: _threshold_data
TunableList.description: List of thresholds for this meter.

TunableVariant.name: color
TunableVariant.description:
Color of meter at this specified threshold.
Note: alpha value is not used. (This may be tuned in place here using 'literal' or as a reference to a Color tuning snippet.)

Tunable.name: hex_code
Tunable.description: An ARGB color in hex, same as one would use in HTML. A leading '0x' or '#' is allowed but not required. You can omit the alpha, in which case opaque is assumed.

Tunable.name: a
Tunable.description: alpha value (0-255) (0 is transparent, 255 is opaque)

Tunable.name: b
Tunable.description: blue value (0-255)

Tunable.name: g
Tunable.description: green value (0-255)

Tunable.name: r
Tunable.description: red value (0-255)

Tunable.name: reference
Tunable.description: A reference to a Color tuning snippet.

Tunable.name: threshold_value
Tunable.description: Value at or above which this threshold exists.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: auto_update_on_stat_change
Tunable.description: If set, the meter will automatically update when the associated stat changes. Unset this for cases when you want the situation to control when the meter changes.

Tunable.name: stat
Tunable.description: Statistic this meter is based off of.

Tunable.name: motherplant_health_statisic
Tunable.description: The statistic that we will use in order to determine the Sim's health for the motherplant.

Tunable.name: other_player_jobs
Tunable.description: Job for the other player Sims that are not the main Sim and are not participating as helpers.

Tunable.name: other_player_sims_role_state
Tunable.description: Role state for the other player Sims.

TunableTuple.name: player_health_meter_settings
TunableTuple.description: The meter used to track the health of the player team.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

TunableList.name: _threshold_data
TunableList.description: List of thresholds for this meter.

TunableVariant.name: color
TunableVariant.description:
Color of meter at this specified threshold.
Note: alpha value is not used. (This may be tuned in place here using 'literal' or as a reference to a Color tuning snippet.)

Tunable.name: hex_code
Tunable.description: An ARGB color in hex, same as one would use in HTML. A leading '0x' or '#' is allowed but not required. You can omit the alpha, in which case opaque is assumed.

Tunable.name: a
Tunable.description: alpha value (0-255) (0 is transparent, 255 is opaque)

Tunable.name: b
Tunable.description: blue value (0-255)

Tunable.name: g
Tunable.description: green value (0-255)

Tunable.name: r
Tunable.description: red value (0-255)

Tunable.name: reference
Tunable.description: A reference to a Color tuning snippet.

Tunable.name: threshold_value
Tunable.description: Value at or above which this threshold exists.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: auto_update_on_stat_change
Tunable.description: If set, the meter will automatically update when the associated stat changes. Unset this for cases when you want the situation to control when the meter changes.

Tunable.name: stat
Tunable.description: Statistic this meter is based off of.

Tunable.name: player_health_statistic
Tunable.description: The statistic that we will use in order to determine the Sim's health for the motherplant.

Tunable.name: player_job
Tunable.description: Job for the main player sim that fights the plant.

Tunable.name: player_sim_role_state
Tunable.description: Role state for the main player sim Role.

TunableVariant.name: buff_reason
TunableVariant.description: If set, specify a reason why the buff was added.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The reason the buff was added. This will be displayed in the buff tooltip.

Tunable.name: buff_type
Tunable.description: Buff that will get added to sim.

TunableTuple.name: rally_battle_sitaution_state
TunableTuple.description: State in which we are battling the plant while being rallied.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: retreat_interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction of interest that we are looking for to determine retreat.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: save_lock_tooltip
Tunable.description: The tooltip/message to show when the player tries to save the game while this situation is running. Save is locked when situation starts.

TunableList.name: states_to_set_on_end
TunableList.description: A list of states to set on the motherplant on end.

Tunable.description: The state to set.

TunableList.name: states_to_set_on_start
TunableList.description: A list of states to set on the motherplant on start.

Tunable.description: The state to set.

Tunable.name: victory_audio_sting
Tunable.description: The sound to play when the Sim wins the battle.

TunableTuple.name: victory_interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction of interest that we are looking for to determine victory.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: victory_reward
Tunable.description: The Reward received when the Sim wins the situation.

TunableTuple.name: warbling_warcry_battle_situation_state
TunableTuple.description: State in which we are battling the plant under the effects of a warbling warcry.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: zombie_fight_interaction
Tunable.description: Interaction pushed on zombies to get them to fight a Sim.

Tunable.name: zombie_fight_interaction_timer
Tunable.description: Timer for the amount of time between zombie attacks.

Tunable.name: zombie_job
Tunable.description: Job for the Zombies for the fight.

Tunable.name: zombie_prepare_role_state
Tunable.description: Role state for the zombie Sims when preparing for battle.
